DOC.brief_summary: The aim of the observational study is to investigate the safety of oxcarbazepine extended release (ER) during long-term therapy in epileptic patients. In addition, quality of life parameters should be documented if assessed.
DOC.brief_title: ESOXC-ER Efficacy and Safety of an Extended Release (ER) Formulation of Oxcarbazepine (Apydan Extent) in Epileptic Patients
DOC.criteria: patients with focal epileptic seizures with or without secondary generalised tonicclonic seizures mono or combination therapy male and female from the age of 6 hypersensitivity to oxcarbazepine MR or one of its excipients
